title: Forgotten Realms: The Archives - Collection Two (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
Note: This collection contains eight games:
- Curse of the Azure Bonds
- Unlimited Adventures
- Gateway to the Savage Frontier
- Hillsfar
- Pool of Radiance
- Pools of Darkness
- Secret of The Silver Blades
- Treasures of the Savage Frontier
1. Navigate to each of the game folders and install each via the .exe file.
Note: Goodies for each game are also in their folder
2. Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS GAME! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: FORGOTTEN REALMS: THE ARCHIVES - COLLECTION TWO
Genre: Role-playing - Action - Fantasy
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages: Text only: Deutsch (FRUA only), English
Modes: Single-player
Released: December 1, 1988
Company: Stormfront Studios & Strategic Simulations Inc. / GOG Ltd.
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/for..._the_archives_collection_two

About:
The Forgotten Realm Archives - Collection Two brings a healthy mix of Ã¢â‚¬Å“Gold BoxÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ and nostalgia goodness to your PC, along with a combination of adventure builders, turn-based and real-time role-playing gameplay. Composed of RPG classics that premiered the Forgotten Realms to video gamers, The Forgotten Realm Archives - Collection Two contains the following titles: Pool of Radiance, Curse of the Azure Bonds, Hillsfar, Secret of the Silver Blades, Pools of Darkness, Gateway to the Savage Frontier, Treasures of the Savage Frontier, Forgotten Realms Unlimited Adventures.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: 
Operating system: Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 
Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor 
Memory: 512MB RAM (1 GB recommended) 
Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended) 
Hard Drive: 2GB HDD 
Mouse, Keyboard
